mapper.select:
select t1.id, t1.name, t1.img, t1.sort, t1.campus_id as campusId, t1.create_time, t2.name as campusName from course_classify t1 LEFT JOIN app_campus t2 on t1.campus_id=t2.id where 1=1
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and campusName like CONCAT('%',#{campusName},'%')
order by sort asc
mapper.update: update course_classify set name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, img = #{img}, campusId = #{campusId}, MODIFY_Time =Now() where id = #{id}
